products.title: Devon Stripe Charcoal Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Stripes are ever popular and this devon stripe charcoal roman blind is a wonderful exponent of what stripes are all about. Thin, stylish and modern this blind will add some designer chic to any room. The colourway is great too, grey is such a modern and works beautifully with the
